body:
The committee are planning to re-open the club in line with the latest guidelines from the RYA and UK Government after the 29th March.

SeeÂ [RYA - Coronavirus - advice and information for recreational boaters](https://www.rya.org.uk/newsevents/news/Pages/coronavirus-advice-and-information-for-recreational-boaters.aspx)

We will be reviewing it's operating guidelines during March in anticipation for a return to sailing.
description: We wish to advise that following the latest government announcement, the club is closed until further notice.
title: COVID-19 Update - March 2021
